hero.title: Ace Your Next Interview

voiceInteraction.title: Voice Interaction
voiceInteraction.description: Practice speaking your answers just like in a real interview with voice input.

instantFeedback.title: Instant Feedback
instantFeedback.description: Get detailed feedback on your answers, grammar, and communication style.

bilingual.title: Bilingual Support
bilingual.description: Practice in English or Bengali with full support for both languages.

resumeAnalysis.title: Resume Analysis
resumeAnalysis.description: Upload your resume and get AI-powered suggestions to improve it.

progressTracking.title: Progress Tracking
progressTracking.description: Track your improvement over time with detailed analytics and insights.
